definitions.definition: The effect upon the judgment or feelings produced by any event , whether witnessed or participated in; personal and direct impressions as contrasted with description or fancies; personal acquaintance ; actual enjoyment or suffering .
examples: It was an experience he would not soon forget.

definitions.definition: A collection of events and/or activities from which an individual or group may gather knowledge , opinions , and skills .
examples: Virtually all employers now require jobseekers to have work experience even for entry-level roles. Many believe this will hurt companies in the long run.

main_definition: The effect upon the judgment or feelings produced by any event , whether witnessed or participated in; personal and direct impressions as contrasted with description or fancies; personal acquaintance ; actual enjoyment or suffering .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) An activity one has performed .
( usually uncountable ) A collection of events and/or activities from which an individual or group may gather knowledge , opinions , and skills .
( obsolete , uncountable ) Trial; a test or experiment.
